languages.text: "В цвета твоей души вернулась упорядоченность. Тебе... легче от того, что ваша связь с Лорд-капитаном нарушилась?"
"Order has returned to the colours of your soul. Are you... relieved that your bond with the Lord Captain has been broken?"
languages.original_text: "В цвета твоей души вернулась упорядоченность. Тебе... легче от того, что ваша связь с Лорд-капитаном нарушилась?"

traits.locale_text: "Order has returned to the colours of your soul. Are you... relieved that your bond with the Lord Captain has been broken?"
"Order has returned to the colours of your soul. Are you... relieved that your bond with the Lord Captain has been broken?"
"Order has returned to the colours of your soul. Are you... relieved that your bond with the Lord Captain has been broken?"
"Order has returned to the colours of your soul. Are you... relieved that your bond with the Lord Captain has been broken?"
"Order has returned to the colours of your soul. Are you... relieved that your bond with the Lord Captain has been broken?"

languages.text: "In den Farben Eurer Seele ist wieder Ordnung eingekehrt. Seid Ihr ... erleichtert, dass Eure Bindung mit dem Lord Captain durchbrochen wurde?"
languages.original_text: "Order has returned to the colours of your soul. Are you... relieved that your bond with the Lord Captain has been broken?"

traits.locale_text: "In den Farben Eurer Seele ist wieder Ordnung eingekehrt. Seid Ihr ... erleichtert, dass Eure Bindung mit dem Lord Captain durchbrochen wurde?"

languages.text: « L'ordre est revenu dans les couleurs de votre âme. Est-ce à dire que vous êtes... soulagée que votre lien avec {mf|le seigneur-capitaine|la seigneure-capitaine} ait été brisé ? »
languages.original_text: "Order has returned to the colours of your soul. Are you... relieved that your bond with the Lord Captain has been broken?"

traits.locale_text: « L'ordre est revenu dans les couleurs de votre âme. Est-ce à dire que vous êtes... soulagée que votre lien avec {mf|le seigneur-capitaine|la seigneure-capitaine} ait été brisé ? »

languages.text: «El orden ha vuelto a los colores de su alma. ¿Se... alegra de que su vínculo con {mf|el|la} Lord Capitán se haya roto?».
languages.original_text: "Order has returned to the colours of your soul. Are you... relieved that your bond with the Lord Captain has been broken?"

traits.locale_text: «El orden ha vuelto a los colores de su alma. ¿Se... alegra de que su vínculo con {mf|el|la} Lord Capitán se haya roto?».

languages.text: 「魂の色に秩序が戻りました。あなたは…ロード・キャプテンとの絆が切れてホッとしているのですか？」
languages.original_text: "Order has returned to the colours of your soul. Are you... relieved that your bond with the Lord Captain has been broken?"

traits.locale_text: 「魂の色に秩序が戻りました。あなたは…ロード・キャプテンとの絆が切れてホッとしているのですか？」

languages.text: “你灵魂的颜色重新恢复了秩序。你与舰长大人之间的纽带破裂了，这会不会让你感到……宽慰？”
languages.original_text: "Order has returned to the colours of your soul. Are you... relieved that your bond with the Lord Captain has been broken?"

traits.locale_text: “你灵魂的颜色重新恢复了秩序。你与舰长大人之间的纽带破裂了，这会不会让你感到……宽慰？”

languages.original_text: "Order has returned to the colours of your soul. Are you... relieved that your bond with the Lord Captain has been broken?"

languages.text: "Ruhunun renklerine düzen geri döndü. Lord Kaptan ile bağın... Koptuğu için rahatladın mı?"
languages.original_text: "Order has returned to the colours of your soul. Are you... relieved that your bond with the Lord Captain has been broken?"
